mapper.insert: INSERT INTO todo SET user_id = #{loginedUserId}, cleaning = #{cleaning}, do_day = #{doDay}
mapper.select: SELECT todo_id AS todoId, cleaning, do_day AS doDay, is_checked AS isChecked FROM todo WHERE user_id = #{loginedUserId} AND is_del != 1 ORDER BY do_day LIMIT #{startIdx}, #{rowCount}
mapper.update: UPDATE todo SET cleaning = #{cleaning}, do_day = #{doDay} WHERE (todo_id, user_id) = (#{todoId}, #{loginedUserId})
UPDATE todo SET is_del = (1 - is_del) WHERE (todo_id, user_id) = (#{todoId}, #{loginedUserId})
UPDATE todo SET is_checked = (1 - is_checked) WHERE (todo_id, user_id) = (#{todoId}, #{loginedUserId})
